meaning_str.bing:
n. 皮带；腰带；传动带；传送带
v. 猛击；狠打；飞奔；飞驰
网络. 带子；地带；裤带

皮带；腰带；传动带；传送带

腰带；皮带；传送带；输送带；带状物；地区；地带；区域
用带子束紧；用带系住；猛击；狠打；抽打；击打；飞速行驶；飞驰；飞奔

1.en: Often remove parts of the abdomen for the infusion to avoid the belt down and around the waist and 4 ~ 5cm away from the umbilical region.
1.cn: 常取下腹部为输注部位，避开沿着腰带周围和腰围处及距脐4~5cm区域内。

2.en: But one thing did not understand the people have to spend on such anti-riot police, even pulling with a pull, even the H-belt drive do?
2.cn: 但有一点不明白，对这样的群众非得动用防暴警察，连拉带扯，连轰带赶吗？

3.en: So there might be more of them in the Kuiper Belt (where comets come from) as compared with the inner solar system near the sun.
3.cn: 所以或许相比于太阳系内部，它们在“柯伊伯带”（彗星形成之地）比较多。

0.en: You relaxed at the end of the meal. You open your belt. You release one or two notches.
0.cn: 你吃完后放松地松了松腰带，放了1个或2个孔。

1.en: Is that a snake? Belt, new and improved. Ah! It's even self-tightening!
1.cn: 那是条蛇吗? 是腰带，比你那条先进，啊！它还能自动收缩！

2.en: Oh, I have to loosen my utility belt. No, I'm full. Just dump it in the ocean.
2.cn: 我得松松我的多功能腰带了。不用了，我饱了，把它扔到海里吧。

3.en: A wimp? Johnny, be cool. You wanna throw down, old man? Certified yellow belt since 1997. No!
3.cn: 懦夫？约翰，冷静点。你想找打吗，老家伙？1997年有认证的黄腰带。不！

4.en: Don't be patronizing. Fine. The hosts don't imagine things, you do. That's not Orion. There are three stars in Orion's Belt, not four.
4.cn: 别一副高高在上的样子。好吧，接待员不会想象，但你会，那不是猎户座，猎户座腰带上只有三颗星，不是四颗。

5.en: Whereas if the government tightens its belt when people and businesses are doing the same, less is spent, so unemployment gets even worse. That is the paradox of thrift.
5.cn: 若政府勒紧腰带，而民众及公司行号也一样不想花钱，支出就会下降，失业问题也会变得更严重。这就是节俭的矛盾。

6.en: So cut your horseshit attitude. Put your seat belt on.
6.cn: 所以给我改了这破态度，系上安全带。

7.en: Belt! Emergency Idea Generator, activate! I've got it.
7.cn: 皮带猴! 紧急想法发生器，启动! 我想到了。

8.en: No. Give that back. Need I remind you I am a yellow belt?
8.cn: 不行。把手机还给我，需要提醒你我是黄带吗？

9.en: That kid came out, out. His umbilical cord is a Gucci belt.
9.cn: 那小子出了柜门十万八千里了，他的脐带是一条古驰基皮带。

10.en: There he is. Belt, I want romance, drama, sincerity. Move me.
10.cn: 他在那里，皮带猴，我要浪漫，戏剧，真诚。来感动我。

11.en: That thing is weird. No, no, no. It's okay, Sandy. That's just Belt.
11.cn: 那个东西真奇怪。不不别激动，珊迪，那是皮带猴。

12.en: Okay, Windows are clean, candles are lit. Belts to tight, gotta change the belt.
12.cn: 窗户擦好了，蜡烛点上了，皮带太紧，我得去换一条。

13.en: And this is Belt. Cook, conversationalist, navigator. Also, keeps my pants up. What are "pants up"?
13.cn: 这个是皮带猴，负责做饭，聊天，指路，还有帮我提着裤子。"提着裤子"是什么?

14.en: Well I dont' have your belt. No. I know that ma'am. It's out there, right out there with the boys still. Okay.
14.cn: 呃，我可没有你的皮带。不，我知道，女士。它仍在男生那儿。好吧。

15.en: I thought it was cheesy, production value was low and the singers couldn't belt like Axl Rose or Mariah Carey.
15.cn: 我觉得这很差，没有产品价值，歌星也不能像艾克索·罗斯或者玛丽亚·凯莉一样放声大唱。

16.en: What do you need? My belt. I lend it to the boy who had the accident. My pants don't hold up so good without it.
16.cn: 你要什么？我的皮带。我把它借给出车祸的男生，没它我的裤子系不好。

17.en: You know once we're in the air and the captain turns off the seat belt sign, you feel free to roam about my cabin.
17.cn: 当我们升空，机长关闭系好安全带的标志后，你就可以自由的在我的小屋里遨游了。

18.en: Seat belt. Relax. Can I make sure your seat belts are fastened? Make sure your seat belts are fastened. Seat belts.
18.cn: 系好安全带，我能检查下你的安全带系没系好吗？请确认你的安全带已系好，请系好安全带。

19.en: Thanks, but if you want to talk impressive, this guy right here discovered a planetary object outside the Kuiper belt.
19.cn: 谢谢，但如果要说厉害，这家伙可是在凯伯带以外发现了一个行星体。
